Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps

Class SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS extends SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is the type of an input value.
    R - is the type of an object to perform action on.
    THIS - is self-type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<Action<T>>, StepParameterPojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptAlertActionSupplier, AddCookiesActionSupplier, AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier, Back, CheckActionSupplier, ClickActionSupplier, CloseWindowActionSupplier, CollapseActionSupplier, ContentManagementCommand, DeclareActionSupplier, DeleteActionSupplier, DeleteHttpCookiesActionSupplier, DismissAlertActionSupplier, EditActionSupplier, ExpandActionSupplier, Forward, FullScreenWindowSupplier, InteractiveAction, KafkaSendRecordsActionSupplier, MatchAction, RabbitMqBindSupplier, RabbitMqPublishSupplier, RabbitMqPurgeQueueSupplier, RabbitMqUnBindSupplier, Refresh, RemoveCookiesActionSupplier, SendKeysToAlertActionSupplier, SetWindowPositionSupplier, SetWindowSizeSupplier, SwitchActionSupplier, ToUrl
    public abstract class SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS extends SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Supplier<Action<T>>, StepParameterPojo
    This class is designed to build and to supply actions to be performed on different objects.

      • getParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Description copied from interface: StepParameterPojo
        Transforms an object to a map of step parameters and their values. It uses fields of type that extends StepParameterPojo or fields annotated by StepParameter
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface StepParameterPojo
        Returns:
        a map where key is a name of a parameter and value is a value of a parameter

      • performOn

        protected THIS performOn​(java.util.function.Function<T,​? extends R> function)
        This method is designed to define a value/object to perform the action on. The action is supposed to be performed on an object that returned as a result of the function applying. The method is designed to be overridden or overloaded/used by custom method when it is necessary.
        Parameters:
        function - that returns a target object on the applying
        Returns:
        self-reference.
